name: Tapu Fini
description: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.

abilities.name: Misty Surge
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to misty terrain.
abilities.description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
